idea:
We can forget a person, place or product but stories related to them will remain forever.

The right authentic storytelling is missing in indian OTT space.The tag line of our OTT platform is"gyanbhi , garvbhi",Any thing which you see on OMTV will either give you some knowledge about Indian culture or will make you feel proud about our ancient culture .

OMTV is a default destination for stories of Sanatan culture.

OMTV is an SVOD(subscription video on demand) OTT platform. Its objective is to enhance the right viewing experience with rich cultural content
name: SRI BAHUBALI MEDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: INCUBATE is all about helping direct-to-customer stores to reach the global market. we love to help small business owners to gain their position globally as an individual brand.
name: INCUBATE

idea:
An online service platform for home services i.e. electrical ,plumbing ,beauty services ,other service which does not require very skilled professional but have learned and gained through experience.

India is a country of abundance of experience and knowledge gained through practice and years spent .this work force is forced to move to big cities in search of job/daily wages  not because there is no work but work is not visible and inaccessible .

The problem is not just on professional side but on user/customer  side :

Majority of people find it difficult to find the good skilled worker for home services or lack a reliable source of information to find one .even finding one leads to another problem of irrational/non standaradization of service charges.there is no uniformity of service charges and it differs from person to person.Service gurantee and quality service is missing in most of the cases.due to job migration of young population from smaller cities leads to another problem of serving old parents from remote ,because of unavilibility of reliable source for services ,booking a service for old parents from remote is not just difficult but impossible. 

Our vision is to provide platform to both customer and skilled work force in smaller cities and towns  with transparent pricing and quality of service.this in turn will stop migration from smaller cities and villages and also help in creating jobs from home.
name: DoorSE

idea:
Chefftin is a new platform that allows customers to purchase home food online from a wide variety of sellers.


Through such a system, it will lead to consumers eating healthier and safer food while also generating an additional income source for the sellers.
